--------------000509080109010601080407 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Hi There is an issue on the data insertion. Can we meet on next friday. I have attached db script here with. mithila
--------------000509080109010601080407 Content-Type: text/plain; name="sql.txt" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="sql.txt"
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users; CREATE TABLE users ( user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, user_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', passwd VARCHAR(34) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', last_access_date DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT '2011-02-03 22:05:58', PRIMARY KEY (user_id), UNIQUE INDEX userid_index (user_name) ) ENGINE InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS folder; CREATE TABLE folder ( folder_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, folder_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, sys_created DATETIME NOT NULL, sys_last_updated DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (folder_id) ) ENGINE InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS email_header; CREATE TABLE email_header ( header_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, date DATETIME NOT NULL, size BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', from_addr VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, to_addr VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, subject VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (header_id) ) ENGINE InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS email_message; CREATE TABLE email_message ( email_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, header_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, folder_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, structure blob NOT NULL, seen_flag TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', answered_flag TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', deleted_flag TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', flagged_flag TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', recent_flag TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', draft_flag TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (email_id), FOREIGN KEY (header_id) REFERENCES email_header (header_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (folder_id) REFERENCES folder (folder_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mime_content; CREATE TABLE mime_content ( hash_key VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, content longblob NOT NULL, mime_type CHAR(10), content_storage_encoding CHAR(10), content_transfer_encoding CHAR(10), PRIMARY KEY (hash_key) ) ENGINE InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS email_body_part; CREATE TABLE email_body_part ( email_body_part_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, email_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, email_body_part_hash_key VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (email_body_part_id), FOREIGN KEY (email_id) REFERENCES email_message (email_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (email_body_part_hash_key) REFERENCES mime_content (hash_key) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS usersessions; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `usersessions` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` text NOT NULL, `sessionkey` text NOT NULL, `expire` int(11) NOT NULL, `sessiontime` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=8 ;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dbmail_aliases; CREATE TABLE aliases ( alias_idnr BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, alias VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', deliver_to VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', client_idnr BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (alias_idnr), INDEX alias_index (alias), INDEX client_idnr_index (client_idnr) ) ENGINE InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
--------------000509080109010601080407--
-
